event.title: was founded by Amariah Watson, Jr. in 1812

data.event: Lexington was founded by Amariah Watson, Jr. in 1812, a land speculator who had purchased wide lands locally in order to sell to other settlers.

event.title: constructed through town was what is now

data.event: The first road constructed through town was what is now State Route 97, and the second was what is now Lexington-Ontario Road.
